author: Katie and Giancarlo Caldesi
method: Put the basil, garlic and pine nuts into a pestle and mortar and crush until it is reduced to a paste. Add enough olive oil to give a consistency you like and mix in the Pecorino cheese.  Transfer to a clean dish and either use immediately or place an airtight container. Cover in a layer of olive oil, place in the refrigerator (for up to one month) until ready to use.
ingredients: large handful fresh basil leaves,  1 clove garlic,  125g/4½oz pine nuts,  extra virgin olive oil,  125g/4½oz hard Pecorino cheese, freshly grated
